title.rendered: NEW Books and Toys + FREE $10 Gift Card Promo!

content.rendered:
Toy of the Week

Nativity Set: $29.97

This child-friendly, wooden nativity set provides a “please touch” holiday experience. The four-piece stable is easy to assemble and the 11 figures encourage your child to re-enact the events of that Christmas Day long ago. A retelling of the Christmas story is included on the package to help create a treasured family tradition for the holiday.

Stocking a Wide Variety of New & Used Bibles!

Gottwals Books stocks new Bibles (as well as used) in a variety of translations and styles. We are happy to special-order particular Bibles we don’t have in stock. If you are trying to replace one you already have, we encourage you to bring in your old one to ensure an exact match!

Send us your special order request here!

Want a FREE $10 Gift Card?

Receive a free $10 Gottwals gift card with every $25 gift card purchased now until Christmas Eve! Gift cards are valid at all Gottwals locations (Byron, Perry, Macon, Warner Robins) and must be redeemed after Christmas Day.

Did You Know…?

You can give store credit to friends or donate it for use by a local school or non-profit. Simply ask us to put a portion of your credit on two or more cards, and pass them along with a Gottwals Gift Card or free bookmark. It’s a great way to share the Gottwals love!

Toy of the Week

Shopping Cart Toy: $69.97

Fun on aisle five! With sturdy metal construction and pivoting front wheels, this kid-size metal shopping cart toy is the perfect addition to your play grocery store. Our mini grocery wagon is easy to maneuver, fun to fill, and built to last for years of pretend play!
